sub_title: Managing Director - Tadano Nederland B.V. / Tadano Belgium BV
summary:
Well experienced in setting up and leading an (After)Sales operation within the European Automotive/Material Handling/Construction Equipment Industry and Heavy Lifting Machinery, starting from stategy, organization, actual implementation to overall operational management. Personality: Result driven "entrepreneur", determined with a commercial mind and strong technical insight.

At ease with challenging environments and driven to deliver swift results, my career has thus far been shaped by working with world class products, companies and colleagues.
Key assets on: Sales & Marketing, Technical Services Support, Supply Chain Management, Organizational Integration projects

Specialties: - Vision and motivation! Make the impossible possible.
- Sales & Marketing, Tender Management, Key Account Management, SLA Contracting, Purchasing, Warehousing, Logistics, Operations management.
